title: Chocolate espresso cake
description: Cook this indulgent chocolate and almond cake so that it is just firm, but still a little squidgy on the inside. Delicious with a dollop of whipped cream and a sweet espresso sauce.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 20cm/8in non-stick spring-form tin.
ingredients: 250ml/9fl oz hot strong espresso, sweetened with 2 tbsp caster sugar
